00022 /// @defgroup cpBBB cpBB
00023 /// Chipmunk's axis-aligned 2D bounding box type along with a few handy routines.
00024 /// @{
00025 
00026 /// Chipmunk's axis-aligned 2D bounding box type. (left, bottom, right, top)
00027 typedef struct cpBB{
00028         cpFloat l, b, r ,t;
00029 } cpBB;
00030 
00031 /// Convenience constructor for cpBB structs.
00032 static inline cpBB cpBBNew(const cpFloat l, const cpFloat b,
00033                 const cpFloat r, const cpFloat t)
00034 {
00035         cpBB bb = {l, b, r, t};
00036         return bb;
00037 }
00038 
00039 /// Returns true if @c a and @c b intersect.
00040 static inline cpBool cpBBIntersects(const cpBB a, const cpBB b)
00041 {
00042         return (a.l <= b.r && b.l <= a.r && a.b <= b.t && b.b <= a.t);
00043 }
00044 
00045 /// Returns true if @c other lies completely within @c bb.
00046 static inline cpBool cpBBContainsBB(const cpBB bb, const cpBB other)
00047 {
00048         return (bb.l <= other.l && bb.r >= other.r && bb.b <= other.b && bb.t >= other.t);
00049 }
00050 
00051 /// Returns true if @c bb contains @c v.
00052 static inline cpBool cpBBContainsVect(const cpBB bb, const cpVect v)
00053 {
00054         return (bb.l <= v.x && bb.r >= v.x && bb.b <= v.y && bb.t >= v.y);
00055 }
00056 
00057 /// Returns a bounding box that holds both bounding boxes.
00058 static inline cpBB cpBBMerge(const cpBB a, const cpBB b){
00059         return cpBBNew(
00060                 cpfmin(a.l, b.l),
00061                 cpfmin(a.b, b.b),
00062                 cpfmax(a.r, b.r),
00063                 cpfmax(a.t, b.t)
00064         );
00065 }
00066 
00067 /// Returns a bounding box that holds both @c bb and @c v.
00068 static inline cpBB cpBBExpand(const cpBB bb, const cpVect v){
00069         return cpBBNew(
00070                 cpfmin(bb.l, v.x),
00071                 cpfmin(bb.b, v.y),
00072                 cpfmax(bb.r, v.x),
00073                 cpfmax(bb.t, v.y)
00074         );
00075 }
00076 
00077 /// Returns the area of the bounding box.
00078 static inline cpFloat cpBBArea(cpBB bb)
00079 {
00080         return (bb.r - bb.l)*(bb.t - bb.b);
00081 }
00082 
00083 /// Merges @c a and @c b and returns the area of the merged bounding box.
00084 static inline cpFloat cpBBMergedArea(cpBB a, cpBB b)
00085 {
00086         return (cpfmax(a.r, b.r) - cpfmin(a.l, b.l))*(cpfmax(a.t, b.t) - cpfmin(a.b, b.b));
00087 }
00088 
00089 /// Return true if the bounding box intersects the line segment with ends @c a and @c b.
00090 static inline cpBool cpBBIntersectsSegment(cpBB bb, cpVect a, cpVect b)
00091 {
00092         cpBB seg_bb = cpBBNew(cpfmin(a.x, b.x), cpfmin(a.y, b.y), cpfmax(a.x, b.x), cpfmax(a.y, b.y));
00093         if(cpBBIntersects(bb, seg_bb)){
00094                 cpVect axis = cpv(b.y - a.y, a.x - b.x);
00095                 cpVect offset = cpv((a.x + b.x - bb.r - bb.l), (a.y + b.y - bb.t - bb.b));
00096                 cpVect extents = cpv(bb.r - bb.l, bb.t - bb.b);
00097                 
00098                 return (cpfabs(cpvdot(axis, offset)) < cpfabs(axis.x*extents.x) + cpfabs(axis.y*extents.y));
00099         }
00100         
00101         return cpFalse;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /// Clamp a vector to a bounding box.
00105 cpVect cpBBClampVect(const cpBB bb, const cpVect v); // clamps the vector to lie within the bbox
00106

00108 /// Wrap a vector to a bounding box.
00109 cpVect cpBBWrapVect(const cpBB bb, const cpVect v); // wrap a vector to a bbox
00110 
00111 ///@}
